thread.title: VN Media Productions Welcomes Newest Luxury Brand Model
thread.title_full: VN Media Productions Welcomes Newest Luxury Brand Model | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: VN Media Productions Welcomes Newest Luxury Brand Model
text:
(MENAFN Press) VN Media Productions Welcomes Newest Luxury Brand Model GAngelo Romano 
Romano is the companys newest luxury brand model 
TimeZone Converter Scientific Calculator Online PR News – 17-September-2015 – VN Media Productions is pleased to welcome the companys latest luxury brand model GAngelo Romano.
Romano also plays the role of 'Nikoli' in VN Media Productions online soap opera Driven By Passion. The storyline is written by the companys founder Victoria Napolitano and tells the tale of the happenings of an affluent Sausalito California community.
G'Angelo Romano is a professional model who works exclusively with luxury magazines. He is also launching an upcoming online cooking show Cooking with G. Romano has modeled underwear and other apparel for The Victoria Napolitano Shopping Network as well.
Napolitano is pleased to announce her companys latest luxury brand model and looks forward with Romano further on lines for The Victoria Napolitano Shopping Network VN Media Productions and Hopelessly Romantic Media Productions.
